MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD5 postcode area of Kelso. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:20pm due to an underground cable fault in Abbotsford Grove and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:25pm on Friday, 13 November 2020
